questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Interior design and lighting
D) Wildlife and animals

A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) Inside a room
D) In a residential garden

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A beach
C) A light bulb
D) A family

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A beach
C) A light bulb
D) A family

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Trees
B) Sand
C) A wall with vertical panels
D) People

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A beach
C) A light bulb
D) A family

A) Incandescent
B) Fluorescent
C) LED
D) Halogen

A) Blue
B) Green
C) Warm yellow
D) Red

A) Trees
B) Chairs

A) Wood
B) Metal
C) Plastic
D) Glass

A) Modern
B) Rustic
C) Ornate and detailed
D) Minimalist

A) Horizontal panels
B) Vertical panels
C) Diagonal panels
D) No paneling

A) Blue
B) Green
C) White/beige
D) Red

What is the lighting situation in the room?
A) Bright daylight
B) Dim and warm lighting
C) Fluorescent lighting
D) Colored lighting

A) Sunlight
B) Ceiling light
C) The light bulb in the center
D) Candles

How many mirrors are visible in the photo?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What is the primary color scheme of the photo?
A) Blue and white
B) Green and brown
C) Warm yellow and black
D) Red and white

What is the texture of the mirror frames?
A) Smooth and plain
B) Textured and detailed
C) Glossy and reflective
D) Matte and simple

A) Above the mirrors
B) Below the mirrors
C) Between the mirrors
D) In front of the mirrors

A) Harsh and bright
B) Soft and diffused
C) Focused and direct

A) Energetic and lively
B) Calm and cozy

What is the style of the light bulb?
A) Antique Edison-style
B) Modern LED
C) Compact fluorescent

A) It casts strong shadows

A) Cracked and worn

B) Metal
C) Plastic
D) Glass

What is the shape of the light bulb?

D) Square

What is the relationship between the light bulb and the mirrors?

C) Victorian
D) Modern
